tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingAssessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    development_name VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_date DATE,
    total_impact_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE building_developments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(255),
    developer_name VARCHAR(255),
    development_date DATE,
    green_building_certification VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE green_building_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessed_by VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_date DATE,
    site_location VARCHAR(255),
    assessors VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE building_developments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE,
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE assessment_reports (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    report_type VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    report_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE assessors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessor_name VARCHAR(255),
    specialization VARCHAR(255),
    contact_info VARCHAR(255),
    certification_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    assessors VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_report TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE green_building_development (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    owner VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE assessment_outcomes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    outcome VARCHAR(255),
    remarks TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE assessors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    specialization VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE project_location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
    address VARCHAR(255)
)
